headline: Data Center Substation Strategic Industry Report 2025: Market to Reach $13.7 Billion by 2030 with ABB., Black & Veatch, Caterpillar, Cisco Systems, and Cummins at the Forefront of Expansion
summary: Key market opportunities in the Data Center Substation sector include leveraging digital and renewable technologies for enhanced energy efficiency and reliability. Opportunities arise from integrating smart grids, AI capabilities, modular solutions, and hybrid substations, driven by increasing power needs and regulatory emphasis on sustainability.
